programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: Suddenly
programme.desc: Four hitmen pose as Secret Service agents to kill the US President.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: People You May Know
programme.desc: People You May Know follows Jed, a 30-something introvert who has managed to abstain from social media until now. When prompted with the gargantuan task of defining who he is, he realizes the life he can fake is much more interesting than the life he actually leads.

programme.title: Berkeley
programme.desc: Berkeley is the story of Ben Sweet, an eighteen year old boy who comes to UC Berkeley in 1968 to study accounting and avoid the draft. There begins an odyssey through sex, drugs, rock and roll, and political activism which turns his world upside down and leaves him on a path of exploration and self-discovery, far from the life of his father, Sy Sweet. The film depicts a group of young people protesting the Vietnam War.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. Uneducated, she relies on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: Bernie Lootz (William H. Macy) is a long-time "cooler" at the Shangri-La casino in Las Vegas: he is paid to bring his black cloud to any table where a gambler is on a roll. But when Bernies luck starts changing for the better--thanks in part to a pretty cocktail waitress--he suddenly loses his cooling talents, incurring the ire of the casino owner in the process.

programme.title: Extract
programme.desc: Jason Bateman, Kristen Wiig, Ben Affleck and Mila Kunis star in Mike Judges workplace comedy. Joel Reynolds (Bateman) is the founder of a company that produces and bottles flavour extracts. His marital love life has flatlined, but he cant bring himself to cheat on his wife Suzie (Wiig), until his friend Dean (Affleck) convinces him to hire a gigolo to seduce her, thus freeing Joel to also play the field. This will prove to be a worse idea than it sounds. But that will be the least of his worries, as a horrific accident in the bottling plant, a grifting employee (Kunis), an aggressive lawyer (Gene Simmons) and striking workers bring his company to its knees...

programme.title: Abduction
programme.desc: A man steps out of a park fountain in Ho Chi Minh City with no recollection of who he is or where he came from. As he wanders through the city, piecing together clues to his past, he is relentlessly pursued by mysterious figures.

programme.title: Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself among the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: Mystery movie. American mystery, produced in 2017. Retired homicide detective Ray Archer and his partner, ex FBI agent Will Ruiney, are assigned to track down a vicious serial killer, who is playing a twisted version of the childrens game Hangman.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: In 1941 China under the Japanese rule, Ma Yuan is forced to work in railroad construction used for transferring Japanese equipment. He decides together with a team of rebels to sabotage a military train with heavy weaponry.

programme.title: Con Man
programme.desc: The story of Barry Minkow, a young charismatic business man who becomes a wealthy CEO by lying, cheating and stealing his way to the top.

programme.title: The Old Man and the Gun
programme.desc: David Lowerys crime biopic stars Robert Redford as Forrest Tucker, a real-life bank robber who found himself wanted by police across the United States for a string of prison escapes and robberies. We first meet Tucker in the early 80s. Hes 74 and has been evading police for two years since his last audacious prison break. But hes not taking things easy and laying low. Thats not his bag. This suave old geezer has a somehow enamouring way of walking into a bank, charmingly informing the teller that he has a gun that he doesnt want to use, and walking out with a big old sack of cash. In fact, hes just done exactly that when he meets Jewel (Sissy Spacek), an enchanting farmer who he quickly trusts so much that he decides to reveal to her his true identity. Tucker, alongside spending time on Jewels farm enjoying her more simplistic way of life, embarks on a string of heists. On the case is local detective John Hunt (Casey Affleck), and Tucker soon finds himself torn between the peaceful life hes enjoyed with Jewel and his old criminal ways. Also starring Danny Glover and Tom Waits.

programme.title: Spooner
programme.desc: Facing eviction from his parents home on his 30th birthday, a socially awkward guy meets the girl of his dreams and creates his own rules for growing up.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: Rosie, a divorced mother, lives with her daughter in LA. But her life is not exactly ideal. The tv show she has been working on seems doomed. Her ex-husband just had a baby with a younger woman, while her daughter has started dating boys!

programme.title: Wake
programme.desc: When things get tough for offbeat Carys Reitman, she does what any emotionally isolated, modern girl would do - she goes to strangers funerals. At one fateful funeral, she unexpectedly meets Tyler, a man mourning his fiancee. Despite the warnings of her undertaker best friend Shane and her roommate Lila, she finds herself connecting to someone for the first time. Searching for answers, Carys goes to see her estranged mother to confront her past. And as she tries to open herself to the risks of love with Tyler, she realizes she may have more to fear than just a broken heart.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: The police are called to a murder scene and quickly discover that the murderer, the victims son, is holed up in his house with two hostages. Through a series of interviews with both the murderers fiancee and his theatre director the police piece together a picture of a man losing touch with reality.

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: American Traitor
programme.desc: Based on a true story. Eccentric, brilliant lawyer James Laughlin (Al Pacino) boldly accepts the case to defend American entertainer Mildred Gillars (Meadow Williams) from ten counts of treason charged by the US government regardless of the inevitable backlash from his country. During WWII, Mildred became a powerful weapon in the hands of the Nazis and was forced to sing defeatist war propaganda to US soldiers based in Europe. Terrorized and raped by Joseph Goebbels, Hitlers right-hand man, Mildred broadcasts hate-filled messages in order to survive the dark and dangerous world of the Third Reich. Despite attempting to murder Goebbels, Mildred is eventually captured by American authorities and sent to trial where, against all odds, Laughlin struggles to redeem her reputation and maintain his own.

programme.title: Mušpapīrs
programme.desc: Vienkāršs gājiens uz banku, lai izņemtu skaidru naudu, Tripam beidzas ar nokļūšanu gūstā pie divām bankas aplaupītāju bandām vienlaikus. Viņam nākas veikt viltīgus un drosmīgus trikus, lai atbrīvotu ķīlniekus un iekarotu klusībā mīlētās bankas darbinieces sirdi. Taču nekas nav tā, kā tas sākumā izskatās, un pārsteigumi seko viens otram.

programme.title: Sociālais tīkls
programme.desc: Kādā rudens naktī Harvardas students Marks Cukerbergs, kas ir datorprogrammēšanas ģēnijs, pārdzīvo šķiršanos no savas draudzenes un lieto pārāk daudz alkohola. Aizkaitināts un apreibis, viņš raksta blogus, ielaužas universitāšu mājas lapās un zog studentu attēlus, lai tos izvietotu savā, tikko izveidotajā mājas lapā. Šajā rudens naktī pamazām dzimst ideja par šobrīd pasaulē lielākā sociālā tīkla facebook izveidi.

programme.title: Atriebība
programme.desc: Kad noslēpumains zvanītājs novieto spridzekli zem Meta Tērnera mašīnas sēdekļa, sākas strauja pakaļdzīšanās pāri visai pilsētai, lai izpildītu virkni specifisku uzdevumu. Ar bērniem uz aizmugurējā sēdekļa un spridzekli, kas eksplodēs, ja viņi izkāps no mašīnas, ikdienišķs brauciens kļūst par spēli uz dzīvību un nāvi. Lai izdzīvotu un glābtu savu ģimeni, Metam ierobežotā laikā jāizpilda aizvien bīstamākas svešinieka norādes.

programme.title: Sociālais tīkls
programme.desc: Kādā rudens naktī Harvardas students Marks Cukerbergs, kas ir datorprogrammēšanas ģēnijs, pārdzīvo šķiršanos no savas draudzenes un lieto pārāk daudz alkohola. programme.desc: Kad noslēpumains zvanītājs novieto spridzekli zem Meta Tērnera mašīnas sēdekļa, sākas strauja pakaļdzīšanās pāri visai pilsētai, lai izpildītu virkni specifisku uzdevumu. programme.title: Manas ugunīgās kāzas
programme.desc: Dārsija un Toms sapulcina savus mīlošos, bet viedokļiem bagātos ģimenes locekļus uz kāzām kādā ekstravagantā apvidū. Svinības apdraud ne vien jaunlaulāto šaubas, bet arī negaidīta kāzu viesu nonākšana noziedznieku gūstā. Solījums "Līdz nāve mūs šķirs" iegūst jaunu jēgu šajā satriecošajā, adrenalīna pārpildītajā komēdijā, kurā Dārsijai un Tomam jāglābj savi tuvākie, cenšoties nenogalināt vienam otru.

programme.title: Sacīkste
programme.desc: 20. gadsimta septiņdesmitie gadi bija sacīkšu ēras zelta laiks: vienkāršotas formas sacīkšu automašīnas, piloti – brutāli trasē, bet jūtīgi un neaizsargāti reālajā dzīvē, seksīgas fanes un litriem šampanieša aiz finiša līnijas. Taču 1976. gada "Formula 1" sezonā vēl skaļāk par motoriem rūca nežēlīga sāncensība starp pilotiem Džeimsu Hantu un Nikiju Laudu. Viņi nemeklē vieglus ceļus uz uzvaru, taču viena neuzmanība, un sacīkste var pārtraukt ne tikai viņu karjeru, bet arī dzīvību.

programme.title: Mads
programme.desc: Salā uz Misisipi upes divi jauni zēni satiek svešinieku, kurš stāsta trakus pasakas par galvasnaudas medniekiem un kādu skaistu sievieti.

programme.title: Pasūtījums
programme.desc: Klusā okeāna ziemeļrietumu kopienas satrauca vairākas banku un automašīnu laupīšanas. Vientuļš FIB aģents uzskata, ka noziegumi nebija finansiāli motivētu noziedznieku darbs, bet gan bīstamu pašmāju teroristu grupa.

programme.title: Marta īdas
programme.desc: "Marta īdas" ir aizraujošs stāsts par ambīcijām, uzticību, nodevību un atriebību. Filma veidota pēc populāras lugas motīviem, un tā stāsta par kādu mārketinga un publisko attiecību ģēniju, kurš ir gatavs uz visu, lai palīdzētu viņa pārstāvētajam prezidenta amata kandidātam uzvarēt vēlēšanās.

programme.title: Roķīgā mamma
programme.desc: Rikija ir izvēlējusies savu ceļu - tā ir mūzika. Ģimeni viņa atstāja otrajā plānā, no vīra ir šķīrusies un no saviem jau pieaugušajiem bērniem atsvešinājusies. Rikijas dzīve joprojām ir viens vienīgs rokenrols, īpaši par rītdienu nedomājot. Kādu dienu viņa saņem zvanu no bijušā vīra, kurš lūdz palīdzību - abu kopīgo meitu ir pametis vīrs, un viņa ir iekritusi depresijā. Vai mamma varēs palīdzēt? To neviens nezina, taču Rikija dodas ceļā. Ceļā uz mājām, ceļā uz pagātnes kļūdām un ceļā atpakaļ pie ģimenes.

programme.title: Čārlija Banksa izglītība
programme.desc: Koledžas students Čārlijs Banks spiests saskarties ar senām problēmām - pāridarītājs, ar ko viņam reiz nācies piedzīvot nepatīkamus brīžus, ieradies viņa skolas pilsētiņā.

programme.title: Melnā kaste
programme.desc: Kas notika reisā Dubaija–Parīze, pirms lidmašīna nokrita Alpos? Katastrofas galvenajam izmeklētājam Matjē Vasēram šī ir pirmā nopietnā civilās aviācijas negadījuma izmeklēšana. Vai notikušais ir pilota kļūda, tehniska kļūme vai tomēr terorakts? Rūpīgi izanalizējot melnās kastes saturu, Matjē aptver, ka izmeklēšana jāveic slepenībā. Taču viņš pat nenojauš, cik tālu patiesības meklējumi viņu aizvedīs.

programme.title: Paldies par maiņu
programme.desc: Romantiska komēdija, kas kopā savedusi trīs atšķirīgus tēlus, kas sāk apgūt izaicinošo un nereti samudžināto pasauli. Kopā viņi sākuši cīņu pret kopīgu dēmonu - atkarību no seksa.

programme.title: Tu neesi tu
programme.desc: Algotais slepkava ar iesauku "Nāves eņģelis" Maikls Salivans uzticīgi kalpo savam bosam Džonam Rūnijam, pateicoties kuram reiz uz ielas atrastais bārenis Maiks ir ieguvis "augstāko izglītību" gangsteru profesijā. Aukstasinīgais un nežēlīgais Rūnijs - Čikāgas īru mafijas krusttēvs - , kura organizācija asi konkurē ar itāļiem, veldzējumu savai sirdij gūst vienīgi Maikla sabiedrībā un rotaļājoties ar Maikla abiem dēliem Maiklu junioru un Pīteru. Abu pusaudžu acīs pilsētas gangsteru vadonis ir ne vairāk kā jauks vectēvs - interesantu un audzinošu stāstu zinātājs un zēnu labākais draugs viņu kopējās spēlēs.

programme.title: Dāma mikroautobusā
programme.desc: Vīrietis izveidojis neparastu saikni ar sievieti, kas dzīvo viņa iebraucamajā ceļā novietotā mikroautobusā.

programme.title: Visa dzīve
programme.desc: Ilgu laiku precējies pāris, kas savas dzīves kopā nodzīvojuši dzīvoklī Ņujorkā, līdz ar plāniem aizvākties saskaras ar privātiem un nekustamā īpašuma izaicinājumiem.

programme.title: Takas
programme.desc: Šajā dramatiskajā stāstā Mia Vasikovska atveido rakstnieci Robinu Deividsoni. Filma vēsta par Deividsones 2700 km garo ceļojumu pāri Austrālijas tuksnesim. Kopā ar četriem kamieļiem un uzticamo suni viņa devās ceļā no Alisspringsas līdz Indijas okeānam. Pārgājiena laikā sieviete atklās patieso vientulības vērtību, kā arī no jauna atskārtīs, ko nozīmē īstena saikne ar pasauli. Lai iegūtu finansējumu savam piedzīvojumam, Deividsone negribīgi piekrīt, ka to iemūžinās "National Geographic" fotogrāfs Riks Smolans (Ādams Draivers). Lai gan sākumā viņi nesaprotas, jo Deividsone alkst pēc vientulības, taču laika gaitā abu attiecības pārvēršas īstā draudzībā

programme.title: Lēmums aiziet
programme.desc: Izmeklētājs iepazīstas ar vīrieša nāvi kalnos. Mēģinot atšķetināt noziegumu, viņš sastop mirušā vīrieša noslēpumaino sievu.

programme.title: Visa dzīve
programme.desc: Ilgu laiku precējies pāris, kas savas dzīves kopā nodzīvojuši dzīvoklī Ņujorkā, līdz ar plāniem aizvākties saskaras ar privātiem un nekustamā īpašuma izaicinājumiem.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone Plus?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: The search to find the greatest holiday baker begins as eight amateur bakers enter the kitchen, where they show off their family traditions and superb baking skills. To survive the challenges from week to week, they must prove their abilities in front of our tough-love judges: Duff Goldman, Nancy Fuller and Lorraine Pascale. Hosted by Bobby Deen, this baking championship is the sweetest way to celebrate this holiday season.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Reality competition for the festive period. A group of talented bakers hope to impress the judges with their Christmas cookies as they face a series of themed challenges. The judges will be looking for inventiveness, decorating skills and, of course, deliciously baked Christmas cookies. Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: Selena + Chef: Home For the Holidays
programme.desc: Selena and Chef Claudette Zepeda prepare a Mexican festive feast. They make roast ham with salsa matcha and a Mexican twist on a historic salad.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: The search to find the greatest holiday baker begins as eight amateur bakers enter the kitchen, where they show off their family traditions and superb baking skills. To survive the challenges from week to week, they must prove their abilities in front of our tough-love judges: Duff Goldman, Nancy Fuller and Lorraine Pascale. Hosted by Bobby Deen, this baking championship is the sweetest way to celebrate this holiday season.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Reality competition for the festive period. A group of talented bakers hope to impress the judges with their Christmas cookies as they face a series of themed challenges. The judges will be looking for inventiveness, decorating skills and, of course, deliciously baked Christmas cookies. Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: Cake Boss
programme.desc: Carlos Bakery in Hoboken New Jersey create elaborate, elegant and interesting edible art cakes. Cake Boss follows the team, led by Buddy Valastro, as they design and create two of these masterpieces for all kinds of events and occassions. The show explores the intricacy of working with your family, and their interpersonal relationships with other employees. Watch as they create everything from classic wedding cakes to alien spaceships.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods
programme.desc: Travel and cuisine documentary series, hosted by famous Andrew Zimmern, American culinary expert, chef, restaurateur and television personality and spin-off series of Bizarre Foods, focuses on classic, iconic foods (not bizarre like in the original series) from some well-known destinations- moussaka and real Greek yogurt from Athens, sweet macarons and crepes from Paris, Italian gelato, gooey fondue to Swiss chocolate from Zurich, mile-high pastrami sandwiches and bagels from NYC, and many other legendary foods. The show will explore where these dishes came from, how theyre prepared, and the best way to enjoy them. Andrew will also discover some secrets and interesting stories behind these epic meals.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: The 10 remaining chefs are assigned famous works of art to use for inspiration as they prepare impressive plates of food for judge Fariyal Abdullahi.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: The nine remaining chefs must turn snacks into dessert before transforming breakfast ingredients into a different meal for judge Brooke Williamson.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out

programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Magnolia Table With Joanna Gaines
programme.desc: Jo makes BBQ pulled pork sandwiches, corn on the cob with charred jalapeño garlic butter and peach cobbler with actress Angela Kinsey.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: News
programme.desc: Новости: a news report from Ukraine with details of the latest national and international stories.

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: Pirmo reizi Džons Makleins nonāk svešā teritorijā, kad ierodas Maskavā palīdzēt savam ietiepīgajam dēlam Džekam, nezinot, ka patiesībā dēls ir lieliski sagatavots CIP darbinieks, kuram jāaptur kodolieroču zādzība. Cīnoties ar krievu noziedzniekiem un cenšoties novērst kara sākumu, abi Makleini atklāj, ka viņu atšķirīgās darba metodes padara viņus par neapturamiem varoņiem.

programme.title: Advokāts
programme.desc: Veiksmīgais advokāts ir sasniedzis savas karjeras augstāko punktu un atradis liktenīgo sievieti, ar kuru vēlas drīz precēties. Viņa mierīgo dzīvi iztraucē senas paziņas lūgums. Piekrītot šim piedāvājumam, advokātam nāksies pieņemt lēmumus, kas neatbilst viņa principiem un morāles normām. Viņš vēl nemaz nenojauš, ka, iesaistoties amorālajā narkobiznesā, viņa dzīve izmainīsies līdz nepazīšanai. Filmā piedalās krāšņs aktieru ansamblis - Maikls Fasbenders, Penelope Krusa, Kemerone Diasa, Havjers Bardems un Breds Pits.

programme.title: Mēs visi svešinieki
programme.desc: Šajā aizkustinošajā, provokatīvajā stāstā par mīlestību, ģimeni un pagātnes rēgiem Ādams dzīvo vientuļu dzīvi, taču kādu vakaru viņu apciemo noslēpumains kaimiņš, kurš uzjundī sen apspiestas jūtas un atmiņas. Abu starpā rodas saikne un nenoliedzamas simpātijas, un Ādams nonāk savā bērnības mājā, kurā 30 gadus pēc nāves šķietami dzīvo viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Karstais pārītis: apbruņotas un apburošas
programme.desc: Viņas ir pilnīgi pretstati - FIB aģente Sāra un Bostonas policiste Šenona. Lai atmaskotu un noķertu starptautiskas nozīmes noziedznieku, tieši viņām ir jākļūst par pāriniecēm. Pēc sākotnējām nesaskaņām un neskaitāmiem komiskiem starpgadījumiem Sārai un Šenonai izdodas kļūt par vienotu komandu - apbruņotas ar neparedzamo sieviešu loģiku un spējīgas apburt jebkuru, karstais pārītis kļūst par nāvējošu ieroci noziedzīgajai pasaulei. Galvenajā lomās Melisa Makārtija un Sandra Buloka.

programme.title: Žanna Dibarī. Karaļa favorīte
programme.desc: Stāsts par karaļa Luija XV pēdējo oficiālo mīļāko Dibarī kundzi.

programme.title: Panda Mēness
programme.desc: Pēc sliktām atzīmēm 12 gadus vecais Tiaņs tiek nosūtīts pie vecmāmiņas uz attāliem Ķīnas kalniem. Tur viņš sadraudzējas ar pandu, kuru nosauc par Mēnesi, un šī draudzība aizsāk neparastu piedzīvojumu, kas izmaina viņa ģimenes dzīvi.

programme.title: Lepnā princese
programme.desc: Jaunajam un izskatīgajam karalim Bendžaminam ir pienācis laiks precēties. Viņu savaldzina princeses Karolīnas portrets. Kad princese viņu atraida, karalis, pārģērbies par dārznieku, iekļūst Karolīnas pilī un iekaro viņas sirdi.

programme.title: Arī divi ir ģimene
programme.desc: Bezrūpīgā brunču mednieka Semjuela dzīvē viss ir vienkārši un viegli, taču kādā jaukā dienā ar mazuli uz rokām uzrodas viena no viņa neskaitāmajām draudzenēm Kristīna. Paziņojusi, ka tā ir viņa meita, Kristīna aizlido uz Londonu, atstājot Semu vienu ar bērniņu. Pēkšņi par tēvu kļuvušais Sems, vēl neatguvies no šoka, kopā ar mazulīti lido uz Angliju cerībā uzmeklēt meitenītes māti. Tā kā meklējumi ir nesekmīgi, Semam atliek vien samierināties ar jauno tēva lomu un vienam audzināt meitu. Taču pēc astoņiem gadiem meitenītes māte tomēr uzrodas….

programme.title: Kina un Juks: Polārlapsu piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Divu lapsu piedzīvojums laikā, kad tās gatavojas pirmo reizi kļūt par vecākiem un globālā sasilšana maina likumus visiem – gan dabai, gan dzīvniekiem,

programme.title: Maskētie spiegi
programme.desc: Superspiegs Lenss Sterlings ir labākais savā profesijā un, būdams dzīvesprieka pilns, viņš ar lielāko prieku katru dienu glābj pilsētas un valstis. Jaunais zinātnieks Volters, kurš apgādā Lensu ar modernām ierīcēm, ir pilnīgs pretstats - būdams vienmēr drūms, viņš cenšas būt nošķirts no visas pasaules un palikt vienatnē ar saviem izgudrojumiem. Taču pienāk brīdis, kad neparastajam pārītim būs jāatrod kopīga valoda, lai ar neticamu brīnumu palīdzību izglābtu pasauli.

programme.title: Troļļi
programme.desc: Troļļi ir mazi un laimīgi radījumi, kuri savā pasaulē nodarbojas ar dziedāšanu, apskaušanos un būšanu laimīgiem. Tomēr viņu idilli mežā pārtrauc bergeni, kuri atklāj viņu atrašanās vietu un kuri ir milzu monstri, kas ir nepārtraukti nelaimīgi. Monstri atklāj, ka viņi var kļūt laimīgi, ja apēd troļļus. Troļļi glābjas, un viņus caur slepeniem tuneļiem vada karalis Pepijs. Pēc divām desmitgadēm Pepija meita Popija organizē izsmalcinātas svinības par godu tam, ka viņi ir izglābušies. Vientulīgais izdzīvošanas speciālists Zars pret to iebilst, jo uztraucas, ka troksnis varētu piesaistīt bergenus. Viņam izrādās taisnība, un bergeni nolaupa daudzus troļļus. Popija dodas glābšanas misijā, un Zars dodas viņai līdzi, jo neuzskata, ka Popija būs drošībā. Viņi ierodas bergenu pilsētā, kur ierauga, kā bergenu karalis apēd vienu trolli. Tomēr Popijas domas ir tādas, ka šis trollis tomēr ir izdzīvojis. Viņi atklāj, kur troļļus tur gūstā un kas tos uzrauga. To uzraudzītāja ir virtuves darbiniece Bridžita, kuru ir apbūris karalis. Viņa piekrīt atbrīvot ieslodzītos un ļaut Popijai un Zaram piekļūt karalim, ja viņai būs iespēja ar karali aiziet uz randiņu. Gatavojoties randiņam, Popija un Zars sastrīdas, jo Zars atsakās dziedāt, apgalvojot, ka dziedāšana nogalināja viņa vecmāmiņu, un šis notikums padarīja viņu pelēku. Bridžita tiek sapucēta kā lēdija, un viņa kopā ar karali dodas braukt ar skrituļslidām un uz restorānu. Troļļi tomēr nespēj Bridžitu pārvērst lēdijā uz visiem laikiem, un Bridžita sāk raudāt. Viņi mēģina izglābt troļļus, taču glābšanas laikā arī Popija tiek ieslodzīta. Popijai zūd cerības, un visi troļļi paliek pelēki. Zars sāk dziedāt un atzīstas mīlestībā. Visiem par pārsteigumu, troļļiem atgriežas krāsas, arī Zaram. Troļļus taisās apēst, bet Bridžita viņus izglābj. Karalis un citi bergeni atklāj, ka viņiem troļļi nav jāapēd, lai kļūtu laimīgi. Troļļi un bergeni laimīgi sāk dzīvot saticīgi, un Popiju kronē par troļļu karalieni.

programme.title: Džeisons Borns
programme.desc: Bijusī CIP slepenā aģente Nikija Pārsone (Džūlija Stailza) reiz palīdzēja Bornam (Mets Deimons), pēc tam nozuda un šobrīd strādā kopā ar ziņotāju, kurš gatavojas nodot atklātībā CIP slepenās specoperācijas. Nikija ielaužas CIP sistēmā un lejupielādē visu, kas saistīts ar specoperācijām, tostarp operāciju "Dzirnakmens", kurā piedalījās Borns. CIP aģente Hetera Lī (Alīsija Vikandere) atklāj ielaušanos un par to ziņo CIP direktoram Robertam Dūvijam (Tomijs Lī Džonss), kurš ir specoperāciju galvenais vadītājs.

programme.title: Pārdozēšana
programme.desc: Filmas notikumi seko Sārai, Tulūzas narkotiku apkarošanas grupas vadītājai, un Ričardam, vietējās kriminālpolicijas bosam. Sāra spiesta sadarboties ar Ričardu, lai apturētu metamfetamīna tirgošanu starp Spāniju un Franciju un atrastu slepkavu, kas saistīts ar šo lietu.

programme.title: Killera sievas miesassargs
programme.desc: Miesassargs Maikls Braiss beidzot var atviegloti uzelpot. Trakais killers Dariuss Kinkeids, kurš piebeidzis veselu baru ļaužu visā pasaulē, nu ir nozudis. Saule, mīļākā grāmata un ne domas par Kinkeidu – ko gan vēl varētu vēlēties, lai atgūtu formu. Taču tad pludmalē uzrodas līdz matu galiem apbruņotā Kinkeida sieva Sonja, un viņai ir sliktas ziņas – Kinkeids ir Itālijā, viņu nolaupījuši teroristi un tie ir jāiznīcina!

programme.title: Eilīna
programme.desc: Eilīna strādā zēnu pāraudzināšanas iestādē. Kad kolektīvam pievienojas jauna psiholoģe, Eilīnai ar viņu rodas īpašs kontakts. Bet viņu attiecības pavisam drīz uzņem grēcīgu pavērsienu.

programme.title: Es, Tonija
programme.desc: Asās un satīras piepildītās biogrāfiskās drāmas pamatā ir daiļslidotājas Tonijas Hārdingas dzīvesstāsts un viņas saistība ar 1994. gada uzbrukumu savai sāncensei Nensijai Keriganai. Tonija ir mežonīga un ambicioza, viņa nebaidās iet pretī straumei, panākt, ka viņu ienīst, un iegūt visas medaļas daiļslidošanas pasaulē. Bet viņas māte jau kopš bērnības meitu ir audzinājusi stingri un pat nežēlīgi. Taču pienāk brīdis, kad Tonijai ir jāapzinās savas rīcības sekas un piespiedu kārtā jāizstājas no sporta pasaules, kas ir visa viņas dzīve. 90. Kinoakadēmijas balvas pasniegšanas ceremonijā Tonijas mātes lomas atveidotāja Elisone Dženija saņēma balvu nominācijā "Labākā aktrise otrā plāna lomā", tāpat filma tika izvirzīta nominācijās "Labākā aktrise galvenajā lomā" (Mārgo Robija) un "Labākā montāža".

programme.title: Bridžitas Džounsas dienasgrāmata
programme.desc: Bridžeta Džonsa ir jauna sieviete, kas pārdzīvo savu vecumu, svaru, darbu, neveiksmes privātajā dzīvē un citas nepilnības. Pienākot Jaunajam gadam, viņa apņemas beidzot sakārtot savu dzīvi, sākt rakstīt pilnīgi atklātu dienasgrāmatu. Dzīve uzņem apgriezienus, kas viņa sāk romānu ar savu bosu, kas izrādās vienkāršs brunču mednieks, un satiek otru savas dzīves vīrieti, kas izskatās diezgan garlaicīgs, tomēr ir lielisks.

programme.title: Bridžita Džounsa 2. Saprāta robeža
programme.desc: Bridžita Džonsa ir kā apreibusi no attiecībām ar Marku Dārsiju. Viņš ir izglītots, gādīgs un arī iecietīgs pret katru (gandrīz) Bridžitas greizsirdības lēkmi. Kādēļ gan lai ikviena Londonas sieviete nekristu kārdinājumā atņemt Marku tuklajai, ietiepīgajai un dažreiz nepiedienīgajai Bridžitai? Kad pie apvāršņa parādās garkājaina asistente, rozā mākonītis virs Bridžitas galvas savelkas aizdomīgi pelēks, un viņa ar skubu metas pārbaudīt abu attiecības. Taču, kad Bridžitai šķiet, ka sliktāk vairs nevar būt, parādās viņas bijušais priekšnieks, brunču mednieks un siržu lauzējs Daniels Klīvers.

programme.title: Bridžitas Džounsas mazulis
programme.desc: Bridžitai Džounsai (Renē Zelvēgere) paliek 43 gadi, un viņas māte Pamela (Džemma Džounsa) atgādina, ka bioloģiskais pulkstenis tikšķ. Apmeklējot kāda drauga bēres, kurš gājis bojā lidmašīnas katastrofā, viņa satiek savu bijušo – Marku Darsiju (Kolins Fērts), kurš ir kopā ar sievu Kamillu (Agni Skota). Pēc bēru ceremonijas viņa dodas uz pašreizējo darbu, kurā strādā par draudzenes un TV diktores Mirandas (Sāra Solemani) producenti. Viņa uzaicina Bridžitu nosvinēt neseno dzimšanas dienu, taču Bridžita atsaka, jo grasās to svinēt ar draugiem. Taču viņa paliek viena, jo visi draugi ir aizņemti ar saviem bērniem. Viņa bēdīga pieņem Mirandas piedāvājumu, un abas dodas uz mūzikas festivālu. Nepaiet ilgs laiks, līdz Bridžita ar seju iekrīt dubļos, taču viņai palīdz glīts svešinieks. Vēlāk festivāla laikā viņa piedzeras un nokļūst nepareizajā teltī, pārsteigta satiekot vīrieti, kurš viņai palīdzēja. Viņiem ir sekss. Nākamajā rītā viņa klusām aizlavās. Bridžita dodas uz kristībām, kurās viņa ir krustmāte un Marks ir krusttēvs. Viņš atklāj Bridžitai, ka šķirsies ar Kamillu. Viņiem ir sekss. Tad viņa atceras, ka viņš vienmēr darbu vērtēja augstāk par abu attiecībām, un no rīta klusām aizlavās, pirms viņš ir pamodies. Kad Bridžita pamana, ka pieņemas svarā, viņas draudzene Šazera (Sallija Filipsa) pārliecina veikt grūtniecības testu. Tests ir pozitīvs. Strādājot pie raidījuma, viņa pamana svešinieku no festivāla un pārsteigta uzzina, ka viņš ir miljardieris Džeks Kvants (Patriks Dempsijs). Viņa tam atklāj, ka ir stāvoklī. Neskatoties uz sākotnējo šoku, Džeks apsola viņu atbalstīt. To pašu pasaka Markam, kurš ir sajūsmā, ka kļūs par tēvu. Bridžita uzaicina Džeku uz pasākumu, un atklāj, ka tajā piedalās arī Marks. Abi vīrieši labi saprotas, un viņi visi kopā dodas vakariņās. Viņa atklāj, ka jebkurš no tiem var būt tēvs. Džeks to uztver labi, taču Marks aiziet. Mēnešiem ritot, Marks atjauno sakarus. Kļūdas dēļ Bridžita pamet darbu. Kā bezdarbniece viņa nomākta klīst pa lietu...

programme.title: Bridžita Džounsa: Kā traka pēc viņa
programme.desc: Bridžita atkal ir viena un audzina 9 gadus veco Billiju un 4 gadus veco Meibelu. Iestrēgusi emocionālā nestabilitātē, viņa audzina bērnus ar uzticīgā drauga un bijušā mīļākā Daniela Klīvera palīdzību. Taču tad viņas dzīvē negaidīti uzrodas vēl kāds vīrietis.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Ričards ir jauns zvirbulēns, kuru savā lokā pieņēmusi stārķu ģimene. Viņš pavada ziemu Āfrikas ziemeļos, taču ir pienācis laiks atgriezties mājās. Ričards vēlas vadīt gājputnu kāsi, bet šim uzdevumam tiek izraudzīts viņa pusbrālis Makss. Jaunais putnēns jūtas aizvainots, taču drīz sākas vētrains piedzīvojums. Tirāniskais pāvs Zamano sagūsta Ričarda draugu. Zamano atsakās viņu laist brīvībā, kamēr Ričards neatrisinās mīklu un neatradīs Zamano dārgakmeni.

programme.title: Singstrīta
programme.desc: Dublina, 1985. gads. Ekonomiskā krīze Īrijā arvien vairāk cilvēku iedzen bankrotā, tikmēr 15 gadus vecais Konors kopā ar brāli un māsu dzīvo pie vecākiem, kuru laulībai draud izjukšana. Lai ietaupītu naudu, Konoram nākas mainīt skolu. Tur viņš ātri vien kļūst par izstumto. Kādu dienu viņš pamana Rafīnu, kura šad tad stāv iepretim skolai, raudzīdamās tālumā un smēķēdama vienu cigareti pēc otras. Viņa ir skaista, divus gadus vecāka par Konoru, viņai ir draugs, un viņa strādā par modeli. Īsāk sakot: viņa ir gandrīz nesasniedzama. Taču Konors nav gatavs padoties un piedāvā meitenei piedalīties viņa grupas videoklipā. Rafīna piekrīt, un Konors ir panikā, jo grupas viņam nemaz nav...

programme.title: Tusnīte
programme.desc: Trīs draudzeņu vidū Bjanka ir visatšķirīgākā – gandrīz neredzama. Pasniedzēji neatceras viņas vārdu, un skolasbiedri – nesveicina. Bjankai pašai liekas, ka viss ir kārtībā, bet bērnības draugs skolas smukulītis Vess atklāj, kāds ir meitenes patiesais statuss nežēlīgajā skolas hierarhijā. Pateicoties puisim, Bjanka nolemj mainīt dzīvi. Taču meitenes apņemšanos apdraud skolas skaistule Medisona, kuras nākotnes plānos ietilpst dalība kādā realitātes šovā, tāpēc jau laikus viņa iejūtas lomā, katru savas ikdienas soli dokumentējot ar mobilo telefonu un sociālajos tīklos audzējot "biezu ādu". Viņasprāt, tikai nejauks cilvēks var sasniegt panākumus.

programme.title: Misija: Izglābt tīģeri
programme.desc: Jauns supervaronis iedraudzējas ar apdraudētu tīģeri, ko sastapis piknika laikā mežā, un uzsāk drosmīgu glābšanas misiju.

programme.title: Nolīdzināt līdz ar zemi
programme.desc: Divi policisti tiek atbrīvoti no darba pēc tam, kad atklātībā nonāk video, kurā abi pārinieki pielieto spēku, lai saņemtu atzīšanos no aizdomās turamā. Nespēdami atrast citu nodarbošanos, viņi dodas peļņā kriminālajā sfērā, kur par viņu galveno ienaidnieku kļūst nesen no cietuma iznākušais un atriebību policijai alkstošs noziedznieks.

programme.title: Pēdējais elpas vilciens
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par dziļjūras nirējiem, kas cīnās, lai izglābtu savu komandas biedru, iesprostotu desmitiem metru zem okeāna virsmas.

programme.title: Omen: Pirmais pareģojums
programme.desc: Jauna amerikāniete tiek nosūtīta uz Romu, lai sāktu kalpošanu baznīcai, taču viņa saskaras ar kaut ko, kas liek viņai apšaubīt savu ticību un atklāt šausminošu sazvērestību, kuras mērķis ir izraisīt ļaunuma dzimšanu.

programme.title: Modiljāni. Trīs dienas uz neprāta spārniem
programme.desc: Pirmā pasaules kara laikā Parīzē bohēmiskais mākslinieks Modiljāni cenšas izvairīties no bumbām, policistiem, draudzenēm un kritiķiem, pieaugošā izmisumā meklējot mājas savai mākslai.

programme.title: Cīņus sports: One Championship. ONE Friday Fights
programme.desc: ONE Championship is a mixed martial arts (MMA) organization that showcases world-class fighters from across the globe. With a focus on martial arts values and a commitment to integrity, the league promotes adrenaline-pumping, action-packed fights that entertain and inspire fans worldwide. ONE Championship not only showcases the skills of elite fighters, but also highlights the cultural aspects of martial arts, making it a unique and captivating sporting experience.

programme.title: Basketbols: Eirolīga. Dubai - Paris
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: LaLiga. Barcelona - Alaves
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. programme.title: Teniss: Vimbldona. Filma
programme.desc: Wimbledon is more than just a tennis tournament — its a summer tradition, a slice of British culture, and one of the most iconic sporting events in the world. Held every year in London, England, usually in late June to early July, its where the best tennis players on the planet come to battle it out on the famous grass courts of the All England Club. Its actually the oldest tennis tournament in the world, dating back to 1877, and its still the only Grand Slam played on grass — the fastest and most unpredictable surface. Thats part of what makes it so exciting. Matches are intense, fast-paced, and full of surprises. Wimbledon is packed with unique traditions that make it stand out. Players are required to wear all white on court — no exceptions. The crowd enjoys strawberries and cream, and you wont see flashy ads around the court — its all about the game. And of course, theres the Royal Box, where you might spot celebrities or even members of the British Royal Family watching the action. From rising stars to tennis legends, everyone dreams of lifting the famous Wimbledon trophy. Theres something magical about seeing players walk onto Centre Court, hearing the roar of the crowd, and witnessing moments that go down in sports history. Whether youre a tennis fan or just love great sports drama, Wimbledon is a must-watch — classy, thrilling, and full of unforgettable moments.

Fixer to Fabulous: Welcome Inn
programme.desc: Follow married couple Dave and Jenny Marrs as they undertake a challenging renovation project, transforming a 19th century historic home into a bed and breakfast. As soon as they saw the property in Bentonville, Arkansas the idea was born. The financial stakes are high, as the place has been abandoned for a long time, but Dave and Jenny are determined to turn it into an inn of their dreams. Join as we follow their journey every step of the way in detail, as they face various issues, from construction to bee infestation and a lot more.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn buy a house thats so termite-eaten, they dont even need a hammer for demo! More problems appear as they peel back the layers.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: Izzy Does It
programme.desc: When family friends hire Izzy to renovate their first home, the Battres family is under pressure to deliver a high-end look that meets their budget.

programme.title: How Close Can I Beach?
programme.desc: Buyers with dreams of living near the sand and surf learn that sometimes the ideal house may not be right on the beach. Theyll tour different homes that offer the beach lifestyle at varying distances to the shore and witness firsthand the clear differences in space, amenities and views these homes offer. After carefully considering their options, theyll decide how close to the beach their dream house will be.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: Jonathan and Drew take on two couples pooling their money for a shared California property. Plus, a single woman is ready to put down roots in Arizona.

programme.title: Izzy Does It
programme.desc: A newly blended family calls on Izzy to remodel their water damaged home, and they need to meet a tight deadline to host their wedding reception.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: Izzy Does It
programme.desc: When family friends hire Izzy to renovate their first home, the Battres family is under pressure to deliver a high-end look that meets their budget.

programme.title: How Close Can I Beach?
programme.desc: Buyers with dreams of living near the sand and surf learn that sometimes the ideal house may not be right on the beach. Theyll tour different homes that offer the beach lifestyle at varying distances to the shore and witness firsthand the clear differences in space, amenities and views these homes offer. After carefully considering their options, theyll decide how close to the beach their dream house will be.

programme.title: How Close Can I Beach?

After carefully considering their options, theyll decide how close to the beach their dream house will be.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: A New Jersey Couple want to get back in touch with their roots by moving to Absecon Island. They want space for their children to stay and a beach!

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. After visiting nearby comparables, the sisters make the necessary, impactful renovations that convert these unlovable houses into diamonds in the rough.

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. After visiting nearby comparables, the sisters make the necessary, impactful renovations that convert these unlovable houses into diamonds in the rough.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Homes Gone Wild
programme.desc: Jack McBrayer tours Americas wackiest homes on the real estate market, learning about the sellers and buyers who call these quirky abodes home.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Did a canoer capture footage of the legendary Bigfoot-like Skunk Ape walking in gator infested waters? Is NASA lying to us about the success of our Mars probes and presenting the public with footage that was shot in a remote location in Canada?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: The Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: Giorgio Tsoukalos explores the mystery of the Nazca Lines found in the Peruvian desert. Hundreds of gigantic lines, some in the shape of animals, geometric patterns and even an alien-like being, extend for miles over a vast section of the arid plain.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: For over two centuries, teams of searchers, including Franklin D. Roosevelt, have attempted to crack the code that will unearth the treasure believed to be buried on the small island off the coast of Nova Scotia. Armed with the knowledge of those that came before them, the muscle of heavy machinery and decades of engineering know-how, brothers Rick and Marty Lagina and their partners may be closer than anyone in history to finding the treasure that has so far claimed the lives of six men.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: Whats the truth behind a pattern of UFO sightings near volcanoes? Who - or what - made the strange stone spheres of Costa Rica? And what is the secret of an unidentified man living alone in the jungle?

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.desc: In small towns, and along Americas back roads, treasures are waiting to be uncovered - valuable relics from history that are hidden in junk piles, buried in barns and stacked in garages. It takes special experts to find these lost artifacts and hopefully turn rust to riches. AMERICAN PICKERS follows two of the most skilled "pickers" Mike Wolfe, owner of Antique Archaeology, and his business partner, Frank Fritz, as they hunt down objects with historical, collectible and pop culture value that have been long forgotten by their owners. Along the way, they meet people whose own stories open a window into American lives and history.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: The Proof Is Out There
programme.desc: What is the mysterious object filmed by airline pilots flying 35,000 feet over Pakistan? Did a Japanese research vessel capture footage of the legendary aquatic humanoid whale-like creature known as the Ningen?

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Bizarre Deaths. In Boston, a 25-foot tidal wave of... Molasses? A dancing plague that kills 100 people? A surgery with a 300% mortality rate? We search the globe for the strangest and most bizarre deaths on record.

programme.title: Greatest Heists with Pierce Brosnan
programme.desc: A duo of highly skilled thieves who specialise in hotel jobs go after the biggest target of their careers: New Yorks famed Pierre Hotel.

programme.title: Original Gangsters with Sean Bean
programme.desc: Al Capone, the man who was, in many ways, the gangster archetype from which all subsequent images and ideas were drawn, the man who defied prohibition to bring booze to a thirsty nation, returns to the spotlight 78 years after his death.

programme.title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe
programme.desc: As we make plans to travel beyond the Moon to new worlds, how are we preparing to become human extraterrestrials? Just how will we survive this trip into the unknown? And what will we do if we make contact with intelligent life?

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Bizarre Deaths. In Boston, a 25-foot tidal wave of... Molasses? A dancing plague that kills 100 people? A surgery with a 300% mortality rate? We search the globe for the strangest and most bizarre deaths on record.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. Was ancient Greeces greatest hero Hercules a real person? What inspired the Minotaurs labyrinth? Did Odysseuss famous journey really happen? This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: Japan, 1612: Legendary samurai Musashi meets arch rival Kojiro in a climactic duel. Modern-day warrior SFC Terry Schappert goes inside some of the most famous warrior cultures of all time to explore their weaponry, tactics and psyche.

programme.title: Buried: Knights Templar Revealed
programme.desc: Join our hosts, Mikey Kay and Garth Baldwin, as they investigate whether the famed and mysterious Knights Templar were really disbanded and destroyed in 1307 or if they survived, taking the Holy Grail with them. The historical detectives journey through the middle-east in an attempt to uncover new evidence of the true fate of this secretive organization. Starting off in the holy city of Jerusalem, the team explore archaic tunnels and a safe house that could have been used to smuggle religious relics to safety. Their exploratory travels then take them to the ancient city of Acre and on to Cypress to search for clues about a covert Templar mission. Secret Templar codes lead the unit to a monastery in Spain which might be able to prove that the knights survived the fateful arrests of Friday the 13th, 1307.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: Brad Meltzers Lost History
programme.desc: Host Brad Meltzer and viewers are on the hunt for lost and stolen history, including an historic plaque commemorating Alex Haleys Roots. Plus: an original copy of the Bill of Rights, and a mysterious ring worn by Lee Harvey Oswald.

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: In the search for life beyond our planet, this documentary investigates areas on earth that are said to have had UFO activity, conspiracy theories and phenomenons. Interviewing a variety of scientists and experts on UFOs and examining when possible evidence can prove or suggest anything towards super natural life. From going off of tales that have been told and spread through generations and or cultures to personal experiences where sighting have occurred the series covers the super natural phenomenon that is life beyond earth.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Search for the Lost Giants follows two brothers on their quest to find lost giants. According to the Bible there were ancient giants wandering along the Earth. A few years ago some Freemasons found stone structures and corridors underground that indicated a lost civilization. The brothers Bill and Jim Viera are looking for evidence of missing bones from ancient skeletons that are suspected to have clocked in at over seven feet tall.
